title: A History of the Archaic Greek World, ca. 1200-479 BC (2014)pdf
description:
A History of the Archaic Greek World offers a theme-based approach to the development of the Greek world in the years 1200-479 BCE.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Updated and extended in this edition to include two new sections, expanded geographical coverage, a guide to electronic resources, and more illustrations
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Takes a critical and analytical look at evidence about the history of the archaic Greek World
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Involves the reader in the practice of history by questioning and reevaluating conventional beliefs
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Casts new light on traditional themes such as the rise of the city-state, citizen militias, and the origins of egalitarianism
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Provides a wealth of archaeological evidence, in a number of different specialties, including ceramics, architecture, and mortuary studies
